title: Traditional Medicine Archives - PORTAL MyHEALTH
cleaned_text: products](http://www.myhealth.gov.my/en/adulteration-traditional-medicine-products/) Traditional medicine as defined under the Control of Drugs and Cosmetics Regulations 1984 refers to any product used in the practice of indigenous medicine in which the drug consist solely of one or more naturally occurring substances of a plant, animal or mineral, of parts thereof, in the un-extracted or crude extract form, and a homeopathic medicine.
